info.name: Dolabb Backend API
info.description: Complete API collection for Dolabb marketplace backend

body.raw:
{
  "itemtitle": "Vintage Denim Jacket",
  "description": "Beautiful vintage denim jacket",
  "price": 100,
  "originalPrice": 120,
  "category": "women",
  "Quantity": 1,
  "Size": "M",
  "Condition": "good",
  "Shipping Cost": 10,
  "Processing Time (days)": 3,
  "Images": ["url1", "url2"],
  "Tags/Keywords": ["vintage", "denim", "jacket"]
}

item.name: Chat
item.description: Note: For real-time chat, use WebSocket at ws://localhost:8000/ws/chat/<conversation_id>/

item.name: Notifications
item.description: Note: For real-time notifications, use WebSocket at ws://localhost:8000/ws/notifications/<user_id>/
